$109 each with shipping included for one of the two that remain.

The McGraw holder can be cracked before shipping, which will make packaging more secure, i think???
Better Luck next time, the extended buying period is now over.

Breaking News

Bad News - 4 turkeys have escaped through the back door, OMG.

Good News - Camnitz and McGraw are still available.

Although the herd has been depleted by these recent events, Camnitz and McGraw will not be the last birds available.
